name: example-plugin
description: A demonstration plugin showing the required structure and fields for OpenCode plugins in the marketplace.

installation.summary: Install via npm and configure in your OpenCode settings file.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

1. Install the plugin:
```bash
npm install @opencode/example-plugin
```

2. Add to your OpenCode config:
```json
{
  "plugins": ["example-plugin"]
}
```

3. Restart OpenCode to activate the plugin.
